name: Patchy's Magical Maze
description:
Alice has managed to retrieve one of Patchouli's most valuable books from Marisa, the library's least popular regular guest. However, when she tries to return it, Patchouli simply doesn't want to see her. To make things worse (or just weirder), the great library has been converted into a maze filled with a gauntlet of dastardly foes! What is Patchy's deal? Could she be jealous? But of who?

A seamless blend of first person dungeon crawling with fast-paced action RPG combat, explore the magical maze as Alice while fighting off foes as her doll, Shanghai.

NOTE: THIS GAME IS STILL INCOMPLETE... but it shouldn't be much longer now! Currently missing: some attack animations and enemy attack patterns, and the final area. However, your progress will be saved and carry over to the complete version when it's finished

Keyboard controls:

WASD - Move

Q/E (dungeon mode) - Strafe

J/K - Confirm/Cancel menu selections

Enter - Pause

J (battle mode) - Dodge-leap 

K  (battle mode) - Light attack combo

L (battle mode) - Heavy attack combo

Controller support included!

A Touhou Project fangame made for Touhou Pride Game Jam 4

Art & code - Fiore

Sound Effects - Gubbles

Music - Mai (for hire, Discord: Mai-chan#1867)
